ABOUT_DESCRIPTION_1: Welcome to our service marketplace! Our platform offers a wide range of service categories, each featuring a number of service providers. Whether you are looking for home services, personal care, or professional assistance, you can find trusted providers here.
ABOUT_DESCRIPTION_2: With our easy-to-use booking system, you can reserve a service by selecting a date and time that suits your schedule. Our goal is to make it convenient for you to find and book the services you need, all in one place.
ABOUT_DESCRIPTION_3: Thank you for choosing our platform. We are committed to connecting you with the best service providers and ensuring a seamless booking experience.
LOGIN_REQUIRED: You need to log in to book service.
